title: Israel-Hamas War: Biden and Leaders of Egypt and Qatar to Offer ‘Final’ Cease-Fire Deal Next Week
content: “The time has come,” said a joint statement by the three, whose teams have led indirect negotiations between Israel and Hamas. Israel agreed to send a delegation.

title: Arab and Western Nations Urge Restraint as Israel-Iran Tensions Simmer

summary: Trying to head off a Middle East war, several countries are pressing Iran to temper its retaliation for the assassination of a Hamas leader in Tehran.

title: In a Surprise, Ukraine Advances on Russian Region of Kursk

title: How Anti-Immigrant Riots Flared in the U.K.

summary: A far-right movement fueled by disinformation has brought fear and violence to cities across England and in Northern Ireland. That has in turn prompted counterprotests.

title: U.K. Officials Express Relief After Far-Right Riots Fail to Materialize

title: 2 Youths Planned Attacks on Taylor Swift’s Vienna Concerts, Authorities Say
content: A suspect confessed to a plot using explosives and other weapons to kill as many attendees as possible, security officials said. The singer’s three-concert Vienna run was canceled.

title: Chinese Woman Loses Legal Challenge for Right to Freeze Her Eggs

title: Why Kenya Stopped Running From Its Doping Past
